review: If you don't already own this thing, you should.
author: George E Trueman

review: Its sloscas hell I want my money back
author: sir brown

review: It's great but I returned it because just realize my Samsung Smart TV already come pre-installed with the Amazon Prime Video App.
author: Clarence H.

review: In a perfect world, and Amazon is almost there, Amazon would partner with the Acorn TV service so I could access my subscription on Fire TV.  Fire-TV set-up was easy, streaming error-free and I'm enjoying old movies I haven't seen before. Definitely a terrific purchase.
author: C. Headen

review: Nice product. Yes, I will recommend Fire TV to my friends.
author: Ruth Besig

review: The available content was a disappointing
author: Aaron Branson

review: I have had Fire TV for a few months now and my family is so happy with it. The selection of movies and TV shows is to much to even describe.
author: Kitty Cash

review: I am so happy we cut the cord and bought this!  We save so much money a month and can watch basically anything we want, whenever we want!
author: K. Bryant

review: missed TV episodes are now up to date...Enjoying movies when TV is a bust...most of the time now.  Links with the Netflix, so don't need to bring up 2 sites to check out.
author: Becky J "BJ-RN"
